00033   class evtgba_reachable_iterator
00034   {
00035   public:
00036     evtgba_reachable_iterator(const evtgba* a);
00037     virtual ~evtgba_reachable_iterator();
00038 
00044     void run();
00045 
00053     virtual void add_state(const state* s) = 0;
00055     virtual const state* next_state() = 0;
00057 
00061     virtual void start(int n);
00063     virtual void end();
00064 
00070     virtual void process_state(const state* s, int n, evtgba_iterator* si);
00077     virtual void process_link(int in, int out, const evtgba_iterator* si);
00078 
00079   protected:
00080     const evtgba* automata_;    
00081 
00082     typedef Sgi::hash_map<const state*, int,
00083                           state_ptr_hash, state_ptr_equal> seen_map;
00084     seen_map seen;              
00085   };
